attributes.action: Look into the matter of honoring Salman Rushdie with knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The decision to give knighthood to salman rushdie is very unthoughtful and very insensitive. It has hurt the feelings of millions of Muslims around the world who think that to honor a man who disgraced their religion is utterly insensitive. 

The timing of this event make it even more worse as already many Muslims are being thought of as being terrorists and such act is only making the situation worse. 
UK always intervene in other countries matters if there is injustice being done but to do some think in their own country can not and should not be overlooked.
Therefore we request that her majesty the Queen should be asked to take the decision of giving salman Rushdie knighthood back.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Rushdie/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
